ygData.subject: Re: Cross Research
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not a good idea at all in my opinion I have played in the past games that allowed cross training and such between classes makes for a bad environment -
ygData.messageBody:
> I think research and use of other classes spells is a good idea, as
> long as there is a penalty for doing so. It would be cool if you could learn
> others spells from half your level. I.E. a level 40 wizard could learn level
> 20 necro spells.

Not a good idea at all in my opinion I have played in the past games that allowed cross
training and such between classes makes for a bad environment -

However allowing cross class research methinks is not a bad idea as I could research
spells for all those words and such I find and sell them to the class that can use it.

Xzar
